kv5.6:1.4: Nanu pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa atthi ñāṇaṃ, pathavīkasiṇañca sammutisaccamhīti?
kv5.6:1.6: Hañci pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa atthi ñāṇaṃ, pathavīkasiṇañca sammutisaccamhi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv5.6:2.6: gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ dadantassa atthi ñāṇaṃ, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca sammutisaccamhīti?
kv5.6:2.8: Hañci gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ dadantassa atthi ñāṇaṃ, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro ca sammutisaccamhi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv5.6:3.3: Tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
